channel.title: insights on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant
channel.description: Recent content in insights on Damien Saunders | Management Marketing Consultant

item.title: 2012 Website Statistics - Content Strategy is not buzz words like SEO
item.description: 2012 was the biggest year to date for web site visitors - and with good reason!

item.title: Key trends in mobile usage from the UK
item.description: Mobile usage in the UK is on the increase. That's all sounding good so far.

item.title: Why Social Gaming is on the decline? Blame cannibalisation by mobile and OTT
item.description: Social Gaming is on the decline - not terminal decline, just platform cannibalisation.

item.title: Get Results from an Android Mobile Marketing Strategy
item.description: Android Mobiles are taking over the world - and that seems to be supported by the latest statistics or _trends.

item.title: 4 reasons to choose Google Analytics for your business
item.description: Google Analytics is one of the web’s most popular tools for reporting on activity and trends for just about any website.

item.title: What Could we do better? Short Web Survey from KISS Insights
item.description: What could we do to make this site more useful? That's a good question - and thanks to Kiss Insights its really easy to ask this of your website visitors.

item.title: Understand your website visitors with live web stats with GoSquared
item.description: I just started to use GoSquared this week - If you've got a high traffic website (well any website really) and want some real-time web analytics or insights - then you better get started with a FREE GoSquared account today.

item.title: Every Important Stat can be drawn in a 2×2 Grid
item.description: Nolan Chart - XKCD Just to prove a point - the 2×2 grid is the best way to show-off pretty much interesting statistic or insight

item.title: DotCom Bubble Burst? Latest Internet Startup Valuations
item.description: Startup Valuations got you feeling low? Maybe its time to buy into the dotcom bubble before it bursts.

item.title: Gartner predicts App Store Revenue Forecast to Surpass $15 Billion in 2011
item.description: I've been on the lookout for this prediction - in 2010 Gartner predicted Worldwide Mobile App Revenues of xx Billion - for 2011 the prediction is for this to exceed $15 billion

item.title: 5,000,000 users on Foursquare now focus on activity & retention
item.description: Foursquare this week should break through the 5 million users mark and it has taken about 8 weeks to add an extra million.

item.title: NEWS: Price Grabber research says we spend more on the mobile
item.description: Finally some proof that Mobile Internet usage is profoundly shaking up the way consumers shop, according to new research from PriceGrabber.

item.title: Comparison of Digital Music Retailers in Europe
item.description: Comment: There are a number of digital music retailers working around Europe, here is Damien Saunders’ summary of a few of the bigger services (catalogue greater than 1 million tracks).
